name: Nucvivor
description: Are you ready for a post-apocalyptic adventure? Nucvivor is one of the greatest independent games that has you fight to survive. You will feel Death breathing down the back of your neck as you fight against deadly incendiary radiation, hunger, thirst, cold and poisonous weather.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit) Processor: Core 2 Duo E4400 2.0GHz , Athlon II X2 450 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 1GB , Radeon HD 7720 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit) Processor: Core i5-4430 3.0GHz , AMD FX-8300 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 2gb , Radeon R9 380 4GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
